title: FC Obod
text:
FC Obod Tashkent () is an <a href="Uzbekistan">Uzbekistan</a>i <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Tashkent">Tashkent</a>.
History.
The club was formed in 2012 and started to play in <a href="Uzbekistan%20Second%20League">Uzbekistan Second League</a>. Since 2013 the club played in <a href="Uzbekistan%20First%20League">Uzbekistan First League</a>. In 2014 "Obod" finished third in League. Year later in 2015, the club won the First League and was promoted to the highest tier, <a href="Uzbek%20League">Uzbek League</a>, for the 2016 season.
